title: Bzzzz
text: Found this whilst going on a walk. Looks notably content in the grass. Old and wise it sits quitly, haveing spoken enough it now wants to listen. Also finished Isak Asimovs Foundation. An ok story tolk in an extremly boring way. Devoid of anny characters or human emotion. The ideas are also sadly tod again better in later work. Also really hard not to notice his compleate ignorance of women. Hoped it would be better.
